extendedInfo.description: ATTENTION:You have to activate it in COL Reminder after installation!Tap on the lock symbol in the action bar at the top!COL Reminder Donate is only a key to extend COL Reminder with great features.You will support further development!Download only if you have COL Reminder installed from Android Market.Without COL Reminder installed, this application does nothing!Important Note:You need to KEEP COL Reminder donate installed, this application just extends COL Reminder extra features and will not pollute your phone!

reviews.title: Occupies more memory recently
reviews.comment: I have been using COL reminder (Donate) for quite some time and found it to be quite good. All bugs were promptly supported. However, a recent update resulted in 12% memory usage. I use a Samsung S3. It drains my battery like anything. Any support is appreciated.
reviews.author: Dev N

reviews.title: Great app, last update made some mess
reviews.comment: One of the best app I have ever used, but last update made some mistakes. After that I contacted developer and he respond in 5 MINUTES and promises fast fix.
reviews.author: Faruk Koric

reviews.comment: Great app until they \"updated\" the time-setting interface, which is HORRIBLE.\tGreat until they \"updated\" the time-setting interface, which is HORRIBLE, unless it was designed to torture us. Just awful. Need fix or rollback to earlier version please. Dev is very responsive and explains that this is the new Ice Cream Sandwich time selection interface but that doesn\'t make it stink any less, and my other apps use the older more efficient and usable interface- why can\'t col?
reviews.author: Eric Robello

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using this app for years now, and it has yet to let me down. Thank you devs!!
reviews.author: Keith Nierenhausen

reviews.title: Works well
reviews.comment: Needs a bi weekly reminder option other than that nice app
reviews.author: mike matthews

reviews.title: Reminder doesn\'t repeat
reviews.comment: If I don\'t notice the alarm out get distracted, it doesn\'t sound again.
reviews.author: Chris Watkins

reviews.title: Essential
reviews.comment: I use this app constantly to keep organized. Very well done app. Worth the purchase.
reviews.author: Erik Visser

reviews.title: Bad & buggy
reviews.comment: Not useful.
reviews.author: Jag Basu

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Worth the donation. Smart widget that automatically sorts tasks by due date.
reviews.author: Wael Shoukry

reviews.title: It\'s great.
reviews.comment: I use it for easy quick reminders.  Very customizable, too.  Highly recommended for setting reminders with just a few taps.but still have great snooze features, etc!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: USED to love this app
reviews.comment: Love this app, but like others have complained about, I hate the new time interface!  It used to be so easy to set times, but now it\'s a pain because you\'re constantly struggling with whether to hit the up or down arrows!  UGH!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Happy to donate
reviews.comment: A reminder app while simple is probably my most used day to day app as I\'m a forgetful person. So having one with a great feature set and great features is important. Glad for all the hard work the dev did.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: This app is very useful. To appreciate the developer work. I choose to donate. Donate version provide extra feature is worth for money.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Colors
reviews.comment: Considered colors that are easier on the eyes? Blues and grays, otherwise works as it should. Thanks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Thia app ia great and it is everything i wqs looking for but it wont sync the reminders between devices
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Worth the buy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Worth every penny!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Galaxy S3
reviews.comment: Best reminder got better. But please add voice recording reminders.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs LED options
reviews.comment: Great app, but needs LED options. Some people don\'t want their LED to flash after notifications. Please add this option to the notifications settings. Otherwise it\'s a really good app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Sits between a simple reminder app and full to-do manager. It does the job perfectly.
reviews.author: A Google User
